items.title: Add editable Hoshin name to document model

narrative.Background: Each Hoshin needed a stable user-editable name independent of prompt question text.
narrative.Problem: The document model lacked a dedicated name field.

items.title: Implement unique default name assignment and migration handling

narrative.Background: New Hoshins must default to Hoshin n with unique numbering per user.
narrative.Problem: Existing saved documents could be missing names and required normalization.

items.title: Wire editable name UI and dropdown labels

narrative.Background: Users needed direct control over Hoshin names and selector labels.
narrative.Problem: Dropdown labels previously derived from prompt text instead of an editable name.

narrative.Background: Model, factory, and editor changes can impact type safety and behavior.
narrative.Problem: Compilation and test validation were required after implementation.
